data.name: Natural Disasters
data.detailed_description:
Natural Disasters is a top-down survival game where the player has to collect materials, build things and help other people to also escape the natural disaster.
The game will have levels with the most varied natural disasters, such as volcanoes, earthquakes, floods, tsunamis, avalanches, etc.

The history is around an unlucky backpacker guy that all the time is in the wrong place at the wrong time on your trip around the world.

Grab your tools and build whatever you need to survive.
The player will have to build numerous items to escape the natural disaster or to protect himself and save people.

Collect the necessary materials, each level will have a difficulty and the type of materials that need to be collected to build your goals.

Craft items to build your objectives or even craft food to restore health and stamina.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Is an indie Survival Top-down game in which the player needs to escape from natural disasters such as an erupting volcano, tornado, tsunami, etc. Each disaster is represented by a level in the game and you must do whatever it takes to survive. How many disasters can you handle?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/ 8 / 10 [64-bit]
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/ 8 / 10 [64-bit]
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX / AMD Radeon RX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
